meanings.sent1: Last night, he outdrunk all his friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to outdrunk everyone at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce, but he managed to outdrunk them all.
meanings.sent4: She outdrunk her own record from last year.
meanings.sent5: He outdrunk the champion and claimed the title for himself.

meanings.definition: Having consumed more alcohol than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He felt outdrunk after the wild night of partying.
meanings.sent2: She was the most outdrunk person at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: Despite being outdrunk, he still managed to dance like a pro.
meanings.sent4: The outdrunk group stumbled out of the bar laughing.
meanings.sent5: The outdrunk individual struggled to find their way home.
